name: Ice Hockey 2d
description:
*** Ice Hockey is a game for all times and for all ages! Imagine yourself as a great  hockey coach. Develop his level and skills of playing hockey.
*** Choose your coach and get control over any of the teams, great animals - hockey players.
*** Take a hockey stick and score goals, win and get rewards. Enjoy the fun gameplay.
*** Participate in single and tournament games against advanced artificial intelligence. Develop your playing skills and win!
*** Earn skill boosters for your coach and give your team more power in the fight for victory.
 *** Bring your hockey team to victory in the Hockey League of Animals tournament!
